channel.title: Athena and SageMaker (Optional) :: AWS System Manager
channel.description: Introduction Amazon SageMaker is an end-to-end machine learning platform that lets you build, train, and deploy machine learning models in AWS. It is a highly modular service that lets you use each of these components independently of each other. You will Learn: How to use Jupyter notebooks in SageMaker to integrate with the data lake using Athena Populate data frames for data manipulation.
